title: Episode 95: Westboro Baptist News and Guest Justin Brierley!
description: Fred Phelps dies - will Westboro Baptist ratchet down the hate? And Phil interviews his new favorite radio personality from London, Justin Brierley, host of the wildly intelligent Unbelievable? Radio Show!
